Document.name: InitWithFunc
Document.summary: Set data for sorting, by providing a list for objects, and a function for their relationship.
Document.typeparam: Type of the list for objects. , or are recommended.
Type of the function that defines relationships of objects.
Document.param: Relationship of objects for sorting, both arguments are elements in "items". To say that a depends on b, depFunc(a, b) must returns true.
Document.signature: template < typename TList, typename TFunc > void InitWithFunc( TList const & items, TFunc && depFunc );
